trans-unit.source: Charm School
trans-unit.target: Charm School

trans-unit.source: When Charm School comes into play, choose a color and balance Charm School on your head. Prevent all damage to you of the chosen color. If Charm School falls off your head, sacrifice Charm School.
trans-unit.target: When Charm School comes into play, choose a color and balance Charm School on your head. Prevent all damage to you of the chosen color. If Charm School falls off your head, sacrifice Charm School.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·2 | The Cheese Stands Alone | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Cheese Stands Alone
trans-unit.target: The Cheese Stands Alone

trans-unit.resname: UGL·2 | The Cheese Stands Alone | Card Text
trans-unit.source: If you control no cards in play other than The Cheese Stands Alone and have no cards in your hand, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: If you control no cards in play other than The Cheese Stands Alone and have no cards in your hand, you win the game.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·2 | The Cheese Stands Alone | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The meat, on the other hand, has frequent visitors.
trans-unit.target: The meat, on the other hand, has frequent visitors.

trans-unit.source: I'm Rubber, You're Glue
trans-unit.target: I'm Rubber, You're Glue

trans-unit.resname: UGL·5 | I'm Rubber, You're Glue | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Speak only in rhyming sentences. If you do not, sacrifice I'm Rubber, You're Glue. Say "I'm rubber, you're glue. Everything bounces off me and sticks to you": Target spell or ability, which targets only you, targets another player of your choice instead. (The new target must be legal.)
trans-unit.target: Speak only in rhyming sentences. If you do not, sacrifice I'm Rubber, You're Glue. Say "I'm rubber, you're glue. Everything bounces off me and sticks to you": Target spell or ability, which targets only you, targets another player of your choice instead. (The new target must be legal.)

trans-unit.target: Knight of the Hokey Pokey

trans-unit.resname: UGL·6 | Knight of the Hokey Pokey | Card Text
trans-unit.source: First strike o1o W, Do the Hokey Pokey (Stand up, wiggle your butt, raise your hands above your head, and shake them wildly as you rotate 360 degrees): Prevent all damage to Knight of the Hokey Pokey from any one source.
trans-unit.target: First strike o1o W, Do the Hokey Pokey (Stand up, wiggle your butt, raise your hands above your head, and shake them wildly as you rotate 360 degrees): Prevent all damage to Knight of the Hokey Pokey from any one source.

trans-unit.source: Lexivore
trans-unit.target: Lexivore

trans-unit.source: If Lexivore damages any player, destroy target card in play, other than Lexivore, with the most lines of text in its text box. (If more than one card has the most lines of text, you choose which of those cards to destroy.)
trans-unit.target: If Lexivore damages any player, destroy target card in play, other than Lexivore, with the most lines of text in its text box. (If more than one card has the most lines of text, you choose which of those cards to destroy.)

trans-unit.target: Look at Me, I'm the DCI

trans-unit.resname: UGL·8 | Look at Me, I'm the DCI | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Ban one card, other than a basic land, for the remainder of the match. (For the remainder of the match, each player removes from the game all copies of that card in play or in any graveyard, hand, library, or sideboard.)
trans-unit.target: Ban one card, other than a basic land, for the remainder of the match. (For the remainder of the match, each player removes from the game all copies of that card in play or in any graveyard, hand, library, or sideboard.)

trans-unit.target: Stand up, Flap your arms, Cluck like a chicken: Mesa Chicken gains flying until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: Once More with Feeling
trans-unit.target: Once More with Feeling

trans-unit.resname: UGL·11 | Once More with Feeling | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Remove Once More with Feeling from the game as well as all cards in play and in all graveyards. Each player shuffles his or her hand into her or his library, then draws seven cards. Each player's life total is set to 10. DCI ruling: This card is restricted. (You cannot play with more than one in a deck.)
trans-unit.target: Remove Once More with Feeling from the game as well as all cards in play and in all graveyards. Each player shuffles his or her hand into her or his library, then draws seven cards. Each player's life total is set to 10. DCI ruling: This card is restricted. (You cannot play with more than one in a deck.)

trans-unit.target: Destroy target card that does not share a color with clothing worn by its controller. You cannot choose an artifact or land card.

trans-unit.source: Sex Appeal
trans-unit.target: Sex Appeal

trans-unit.source: Prevent up to 3 damage total to any number of creatures and/or players. If there are more players in the room of the opposite sex, prevent up to 3 additional damage total to any number of creatures and/or players.
trans-unit.target: Prevent up to 3 damage total to any number of creatures and/or players. If there are more players in the room of the opposite sex, prevent up to 3 additional damage total to any number of creatures and/or players.

trans-unit.source: Bureaucracy
trans-unit.target: Bureaucracy

trans-unit.source: Pursuant to subsection 3.1(4) of Richard's Rules of Order, during the upkeep of each participant in this game of the Magic: The Gathering® trading card game (hereafter known as "PLAYER"), that PLAYER performs all actions in the sequence of previously added actions (hereafter known as "ACTION QUEUE"), in the order those actions were added, then adds another action to the end of the ACTION QUEUE. All actions must be simple physical or verbal actions that a player can perform while sitting in a chair, without jeopardizing the health and security of said PLAYER. If any PLAYER does not perform all the prescribed actions in the correct order, sacrifice Bureaucracy and said PLAYER discards his or her complement of cards in hand (hereafter known as "HAND").
trans-unit.target: Pursuant to subsection 3.1(4) of Richard's Rules of Order, during the upkeep of each participant in this game of the Magic: The Gathering® trading card game (hereafter known as "PLAYER"), that PLAYER performs all actions in the sequence of previously added actions (hereafter known as "ACTION QUEUE"), in the order those actions were added, then adds another action to the end of the ACTION QUEUE. All actions must be simple physical or verbal actions that a player can perform while sitting in a chair, without jeopardizing the health and security of said PLAYER. If any PLAYER does not perform all the prescribed actions in the correct order, sacrifice Bureaucracy and said PLAYER discards his or her complement of cards in hand (hereafter known as "HAND").

trans-unit.source: Censorship
trans-unit.target: Censorship

trans-unit.source: When Censorship comes into play, choose a CENSORED word. Whenever any CENSORED player says the chosen CENSORED word, Censorship deals 2 CENSORED damage to him or her.
trans-unit.target: When Censorship comes into play, choose a CENSORED word. Whenever any CENSORED player says the chosen CENSORED word, Censorship deals 2 CENSORED damage to him or her.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·16 | Checks and Balances | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Checks and Balances
trans-unit.target: Checks and Balances

trans-unit.resname: UGL·16 | Checks and Balances | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever any spell is played, counter that spell if each player, other than the caster and his or her teammates, agrees to choose and discard a card. Those players must discard those cards after agreeing. Checks and Balances may be played only in a game with three or more players.
trans-unit.target: Whenever any spell is played, counter that spell if each player, other than the caster and his or her teammates, agrees to choose and discard a card. Those players must discard those cards after agreeing. Checks and Balances may be played only in a game with three or more players.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·17 | Chicken à la King | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chicken à la King
trans-unit.target: Chicken à la King

trans-unit.resname: UGL·17 | Chicken à la King | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a 6 is rolled on a six-sided die, put a +1/+1 counter on each Chicken in play. (You may roll dice only when a card instructs you to.) Tap a Chicken you control: Roll a six-sided die.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a 6 is rolled on a six-sided die, put a +1/+1 counter on each Chicken in play. (You may roll dice only when a card instructs you to.) Tap a Chicken you control: Roll a six-sided die.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·17 | Chicken à la King | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: During the Chicken Revolution, the king managed to keep his head while the others—well, just ran around.
trans-unit.target: During the Chicken Revolution, the king managed to keep his head while the others—well, just ran around.

trans-unit.source: Clambassadors
trans-unit.target: Clambassadors

trans-unit.target: If Clambassadors damages any player, choose an artifact, creature, or land you control. That player gains control of that artifact, creature, or land.

trans-unit.source: "Sorry we shelled your village—here's some gold."

trans-unit.target: Clam-I-Am

trans-unit.source: Whenever you roll a 3 on a six-sided die, you may reroll that die.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you roll a 3 on a six-sided die, you may reroll that die.

trans-unit.source: Clam Session
trans-unit.target: Clam Session

trans-unit.target: When Clam Session comes into play, choose a word. During your upkeep, sing at least six words of a song, one of which must be the chosen word, or sacrifice Clam Session. You cannot repeat a song.

trans-unit.target: Common Courtesy

trans-unit.target: Counter any spell unless its caster asks your permission to play that spell. If you refuse permission, Sacrifice Common Courtesy and counter the spell.

trans-unit.target: "You didn't say the Magic word."

trans-unit.source: Denied!
trans-unit.target: Denied!

trans-unit.source: Play Denied only as any opponent casts target spell. Name a card, then look at all cards in that player's hand. If the named card is in the player's hand, counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: Play Denied only as any opponent casts target spell. Name a card, then look at all cards in that player's hand. If the named card is in the player's hand, counter target spell.

trans-unit.target: "But next time we meet, . . ."

trans-unit.target: Fowl Play

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a 1/1 creature that counts as a Chicken.
trans-unit.target: Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a 1/1 creature that counts as a Chicken.

trans-unit.source: "I feel like chicken tonight!"
trans-unit.target: "I feel like chicken tonight!"

trans-unit.source: Free-for-All
trans-unit.target: Free-for-All

trans-unit.source: When Free-for-All comes into play, set aside all creatures in play, face down. During each player's upkeep, that player chooses a creature card at random from those set aside in this way and puts that creature into play under his or her control. If Free-for-All leaves play, put each creature still set aside this way into its owner's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: When Free-for-All comes into play, set aside all creatures in play, face down. During each player's upkeep, that player chooses a creature card at random from those set aside in this way and puts that creature into play under his or her control. If Free-for-All leaves play, put each creature still set aside this way into its owner's graveyard.

trans-unit.source: Psychic Network
trans-unit.target: Psychic Network

trans-unit.source: Each player reveals the top card of his or her library to all other players by continuously holding it against his or her forehead. This does not allow a player to look at his or her own card. (That card still counts as the top card of your library. Whenever you draw a card, draw that one and replace it with the next card of your library.)
trans-unit.target: Each player reveals the top card of his or her library to all other players by continuously holding it against his or her forehead. This does not allow a player to look at his or her own card. (That card still counts as the top card of your library. Whenever you draw a card, draw that one and replace it with the next card of your library.)

trans-unit.source: Sorry
trans-unit.target: Sorry

trans-unit.source: Before playing any spell, if a copy of that spell card is in any graveyard, the spell's caster may say "Sorry." If he or she does not, any other player may counter the spell by saying "Sorry" as it is cast. If any player says "Sorry" at any other time, Sorry deals 2 damage to that player.
trans-unit.target: Before playing any spell, if a copy of that spell card is in any graveyard, the spell's caster may say "Sorry." If he or she does not, any other player may counter the spell by saying "Sorry" as it is cast. If any player says "Sorry" at any other time, Sorry deals 2 damage to that player.

trans-unit.source: Jumbo Imp
trans-unit.target: Jumbo Imp

trans-unit.source: Flying When you play Jumbo Imp, roll a six-sided die. Jumbo Imp comes into play with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the die roll. During your upkeep, roll a six-sided die and put on Jumbo Imp a number of +1/+1 counters equal to the die roll. At the end of your turn, roll a six-sided die and remove from Jumbo Imp a number of +1/+1 counters equal to the die roll.
trans-unit.target: Flying When you play Jumbo Imp, roll a six-sided die. Jumbo Imp comes into play with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the die roll. At the end of your turn, roll a six-sided die and remove from Jumbo Imp a number of +1/+1 counters equal to the die roll.

trans-unit.target: Flying Whenever a creature is put into any graveyard from play, you may roll a six-sided die. On a 1, sacrifice Poultrygeist. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on Poultrygeist.

trans-unit.source: When Volrath's Motion Sensor comes into play, choose target hand controlled by an opponent. Enchanted player balances Volrath's Motion Sensor on the back of that hand. If Volrath's Motion Sensor falls off the hand, sacrifice Volrath's Motion Sensor and that player loses 3 life.

trans-unit.source: Whenever any player taps a card, that player gives control of that card to an opponent at end of turn. If a player does not tap any nonland cards during his or her turn, Burning Cinder Fury of Crimson Chaos Fire deals 3 damage to that player at end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Whenever any player taps a card, that player gives control of that card to an opponent at end of turn. If a player does not tap any nonland cards during his or her turn, Burning Cinder Fury of Crimson Chaos Fire deals 3 damage to that player at end of turn.

trans-unit.source: Jalum Grifter
trans-unit.target: Jalum Grifter

trans-unit.source: o1o R, oc T: Put Jalum Grifter and two lands you control face down in front of target opponent after revealing each card to him or her. Then, rearrange the order of the three cards as often as you wish, keeping them on the table at all times. That opponent then chooses one of those cards. If a land is chosen, destroy target card in play. Otherwise, sacrifice Jalum Grifter.

If a land is chosen, destroy target card in play. Otherwise, sacrifice Jalum Grifter.

trans-unit.source: Landfill

trans-unit.source: Choose a land type. Remove from play all lands of that type that you control. Drop those cards, one at a time, onto the playing area from a height of at least one foot. Destroy each card in play that is completely covered by those cards. Then return to play, tapped, all lands dropped in this way.

trans-unit.source: Ricochet
trans-unit.target: Ricochet

trans-unit.source: Whenever any spell targets a single player, each player rolls a six-sided die. That spell is redirected to the player or players with the lowest die roll. If two or more players tie for the lowest die roll, they reroll until there is no tie.
trans-unit.target: Whenever any spell targets a single player, each player rolls a six-sided die. That spell is redirected to the player or players with the lowest die roll. If two or more players tie for the lowest die roll, they reroll until there is no tie.

trans-unit.source: Spark Fiend
trans-unit.target: Spark Fiend

trans-unit.source: When Spark Fiend comes into play, roll two six-sided dice. On a total of 2, 3, or 12, sacrifice Spark Fiend. On a total of 7 or 11, do not roll dice for Spark Fiend during any of your following upkeep phases. If you roll any other total, note it. During your upkeep, roll two six-sided dice. On a total of 7, sacrifice Spark Fiend. If you roll the noted total, do not roll dice for Spark Fiend during any of your following upkeep phases. On any other roll, there is no effect.
trans-unit.target: When Spark Fiend comes into play, roll two six-sided dice. On a total of 2, 3, or 12, sacrifice Spark Fiend. On a total of 7 or 11, do not roll dice for Spark Fiend during any of your following upkeep phases. If you roll any other total, note it. During your upkeep, roll two six-sided dice. On a total of 7, sacrifice Spark Fiend. If you roll the noted total, do not roll dice for Spark Fiend during any of your following upkeep phases. On any other roll, there is no effect.

trans-unit.source: Strategy, Schmategy
trans-unit.target: Strategy, Schmategy

trans-unit.source: Roll a six-sided die for Strategy, Schmategy. On a 1, Strategy, Schmategy has no effect. Otherwise, it has one of the following effects. 2 Destroy all artifacts. 3 Destroy all lands. 4 Strategy, Schmategy deals 3 damage to each creature and player. 5 Each player discards his or her hand and draws seven cards. 6 Roll the die two more times.
trans-unit.target: Roll a six-sided die for Strategy, Schmategy. On a 1, Strategy, Schmategy has no effect. Otherwise, it has one of the following effects. 2 Destroy all artifacts. 3 Destroy all lands. 4 Strategy, Schmategy deals 3 damage to each creature and player. 5 Each player discards his or her hand and draws seven cards. 6 Roll the die two more times.

trans-unit.source: Free-Range Chicken
trans-unit.target: Free-Range Chicken

trans-unit.source: o1o G: Roll two six-sided dice. If both die rolls are the same, Free-Range Chicken gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number rolled on each die. Otherwise, if the total rolled is equal to any other total you have rolled this turn for Free-Range Chicken, sacrifice it. (For example, if you roll two 3s, Free-Range Chicken gets +3/+3. If you roll a total of 6 for Free-Range Chicken later in that turn, sacrifice it.)
trans-unit.target: o1o G: Roll two six-sided dice. If both die rolls are the same, Free-Range Chicken gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number rolled on each die. Otherwise, if the total rolled is equal to any other total you have rolled this turn for Free-Range Chicken, sacrifice it. (For example, if you roll two 3s, Free-Range Chicken gets +3/+3. If you roll a total of 6 for Free-Range Chicken later in that turn, sacrifice it.)

trans-unit.source: Gerrymandering

trans-unit.target: Remove all lands from play and shuffle them together. Randomly deal to each player one land card for each land he or she had before. Each player puts those lands into play under his or her control, untapped.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·65 | Mine, Mine, Mine! | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Mine, Mine, Mine comes into play, each player puts his or her library into his or her hand. Each player skips his or her discard phase and does not lose as a result of being unable to draw a card. Each player cannot play more than one spell each turn. If Mine, Mine, Mine leaves play, each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library.
trans-unit.target: When Mine, Mine, Mine comes into play, each player puts his or her library into his or her hand. Each player skips his or her discard phase and does not lose as a result of being unable to draw a card. Each player cannot play more than one spell each turn. If Mine, Mine, Mine leaves play, each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library.
